name: incompetency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
lack of ability to do something successfully or as it should be done, or an example of this: This is not about dishonesty, but incompetency.incompetency of I completely agree with your comment about the incompetency of the management team. Critics always point to the flaws and incompetencies of the leader.
More examplesFewer examplesChildren are being made to suffer because of the incompetency of the government.Along with the obvious issues, there were unseen incompetencies.
